title: DoubleTree By Hilton Metropolitan, An NYC Hotel, Announces Special Offers For Fall Visitors
text: DoubleTree By Hilton Metropolitan, An NYC Hotel, Announces Special Offers For Fall Visitors By PR Newswire | 10/22/15 - 09:25 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- DoubleTree by Hilton Metropolitan is pleased to announce a number of special offers for those planning a visit to the City for the fall or for the upcoming holiday season. This ideally-located Manhattan Hotel is a perfect choice for both business and leisure guests, and the impressive special offers include something for every interest. A few popular offers are described below, and all can be seen on the Hotel's website. View offer details > Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151022/279796 Family Fun Package For those planning a family getaway to the City, this offer at our NYC Hotel is a top choice. The Family Fun Package includes a great rate, free WiFi, and daily breakfast for four. Families can start their day with a nutritious breakfast before heading out to explore all the City has to offer. Triple Points with Shopping on Top Many guests at our Manhattan Hotel come for one reason: to shop! Member of Hilton Honors program will earn TRIPLE points when selecting this special offer from DoubleTree by Hilton Metropolitan. Also included is a 10% off saving certificate for Macy's - one of the most popular Shopping destinations in the City! Taste of NY Double Points Another reason to the visit the City is to enjoy dining at some of the best New York City Restaurants. Whether visitors are looking for a fine dining experience or want to find the best pizza in the City, DoubleTree by Hilton Metropolitan is located near many top options. Another way to explore the City's culinary scene is by taking a food tour. This special offer includes $12 off of City Food Tours as well as coupons for nearby Restaurants such as Bustan Restaurant and Desmond's Steakhouse. Those planning a stay can visit the NYC Hotel's website or call 800.675.6706 for more information about these and other Special Offers. About DoubleTree by Hilton Metropolitan - An NYC Hotel: DoubleTree by Hilton Metropolitan is an ideally-located Midtown Manhattan Hotel. Both business and leisure travelers appreciate the upscale amenities, onsite dining, modern decor, and thoughtful service. Travelers coming for New York Events, business trips, or a family getaway find these NY Accommodations to be a great choice. The NYC hotel was recently renovated and updated with Sweet Dreams by DoubleTree Sleep Experience beds. Other features of the renovation include contemporary bathrooms, new work desks with ergonomic chairs, new LCD TVs, and more. Crabtree & Evelyn bath products await each guest. 1 of 2
